detectors.description:
Token.isOverflow(uint256,uint256).isOverflow () shadows:
	- Token.isOverflow(uint256,uint256) () (function)

Token.replaceOwner(address)._newOwner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _newOwner ()

Token.setSupplyAdjuster(address)._newSupplyAdjuster () lacks a zero-check on :
		- supplyAdjuster = _newSupplyAdjuster ()
Modifier Token.validTransfer(address,address,uint256) () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [Token.validTransfer(address,address,uint256)]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description: Modifier Token.canAdjustSupply() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [Token.canAdjustSupply()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description: Modifier Token.blockLock(address) () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [Token.blockLock(address)]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description: Modifier Token.onlyOwner() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [Token.onlyOwner()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Token.isTransferValid(address,address,uint256) () compares to a boolean constant:
	-balances[_from] >= _amount && isOverflow(balances[_to],_amount) == false && _amount > 0 && _to != address(this) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Token.isTransferValid(address,address,uint256)]() compares to a boolean constant:
	-[balances[_from] >= _amount && isOverflow(balances[_to],_amount) == false && _amount > 0 && _to != address(this)]()

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.7 () allows old versions
solc-0.4.7 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.7 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Parameter Token.setTotalSupply(uint256)._amount () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.isOverflow(uint256,uint256)._increase () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.setBalance(address,uint256)._newBalance () is not in mixedCase
Contract tokenRecipient () is not in CapWords
Parameter Token.setBlockLock(uint256)._lockedUntilBlock () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.isOverflow(uint256,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.setSupplyAdjuster(address)._newSupplyAdjuster () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.allowance(address,address)._owner () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.setBalance(address,uint256)._addr () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.isTransferValid(address,address,uint256)._from () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transfer(address,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.isTransferValid(address,address,uint256)._amount () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approve(address,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.balanceOf(address)._owner () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes)._extraData () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes)._spender () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)._to () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approve(address,uint256)._spender () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)._from () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transfer(address,uint256)._to () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.replaceOwner(address)._newOwner () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.isTransferValid(address,address,uint256)._to () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.allowance(address,address)._spender () is not in mixedCase
Token.version () is never used in Token ()
Token.version () should be constant

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) should be declared external:
	- tokenRecipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) ()

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- Token.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) ()
